title: City Bus Driver
fullContent: Home› BusCity Bus DriverBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWould you like to be a bus driver in your own city ? City Bus Driver is the perfect simulator that gives you the chance drive a bus and to take the passengers to a specific destination on map. You have to always use different camera angles and don't hit with the trafic & passengers.First you need to start the engine to be able to drive and then follow the yellow dot on the map to find the stop station.There are 3 cars available to be bought. 1 is for free and others 2 can be bought with 20000 & 40000 cash.Have fun completing all 10 levels.City Bus Driver Controls:• WASD to control bus • C to change camera viewThis article was updated on December 20, 20231 Player3DBusDrivingFreeSimulatorTraffic
